name: Sigil of the Void
description:
Sigil of the Void is a pixelart video game, made with Unity Engine.

"Once in the kingdom of Reidron there was a very wicked prince. After his father's passing, he split his kingdom into two parts. One was fighting for Heirmla, the goddess of light and life. The other part was dissapointed by their weakness caused by allegiance to the gods, so they followed the prince. He later became the king of the rebellious and claimed the name of Lartock the Wicked.

Lartock wanted to take over every territory of his enemy. He was bored with being obedient to gods, so much that he told himself that he is a god. The only god.

For his goal he needed enormous power, so he took advice of his personal oracle. He was told that there is an artifact that holds souls of defeated kings and has the power to control every enemy. With that artifact, he could easily order all his enemies to surrender and he would get unlimited power. He would become a god. But Heirmla's servants fought very hard to save their kingdom. To save their world.

Inside the fog of war, a child was born..."
